arm_group.arm_group_label: Suicidal older persons and their families
arm_group.description: Suicidal older persons and their families will be interviewed

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the proposed study is to examine the phenomenon of suicidality in old age and
      its unique characteristics. This will be performed through observing the multigenerational
      aging family from the life-course perspective, which enables the researchers to address life
      transitions, including crises leading to suicidal tendencies.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Meaning of Suicidality for Older Persons With Suicidal Tendencies and Their Families

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Hebrew speaking

          -  Suicidal

          -  Families of elderly suicides

          -  Cognitive ability

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  All others

study_pop.textblock:
Aged individuals from  tertiary and primary care and from the community who have
        experienced suicidality and their families.

intervention.arm_group_label: Suicidal older persons and their families

primary_outcome.description: In-depth interviews with older persons experiencing suicidality and their families -  in order to understand them.
primary_outcome.measure: Understanding older persons experiencing suicidality and their families

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
